meanings.definition: To provide with necessary items or skills
meanings.sent1: She enjoys equipping her students with new knowledge.
meanings.sent2: The firefighters are equipping themselves with safety gear before entering the burning building.
meanings.sent3: The chef was equipping the vegetables with delicious seasonings, turning them into a flavorful dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist equipping her canvas with vibrant colors, creating a masterpiece that captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The teacher was equipping her classroom with educational tools to enhance the learning experience.

meanings.definition: The act of preparing or supplying with necessary items or skills
meanings.sent1: The equipping of the soldiers with advanced weaponry was crucial for their mission.
meanings.sent2: The equipping of the new gym included state-of-the-art exercise equipment.
meanings.sent3: The equipping of the camping trip with extra snacks brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The equipping of the kitchen with high-quality utensils made cooking a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The equipping of the students with textbooks and notebooks prepared them for the upcoming exams.
